name: ContentsOnly: GIZMODO Japan
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("gizmodo.jp") {

/* Non-display part */
#lightbox,
#head,
.headline,
#extra_content,
#menu,
#access_data,
.page_navi,
#sub_contents,
#foot,
.e_com_tra,
.widgetbox,
#ads_01,
#ads_02,
#ads_03,
#ads_04,
#ads_05,
#ads_06,
#ad_01,
#ad_02,
#ad_03,
#ad_04,
#ad_05,
#ad_06,
#ad_text,
.entry_data,
.page_top,
#post,
#mailform,
.disqus,
.left,
#side,
.entrybox,
.ad_entrybox_under,
.clr,
.entry_side,
#entry_actions,
.ad_main_end,
.ad_entry_title_under
{ display: none !important; }

/* Display part */
body,
#container,
#wrap,
#body,
#main,
.entry,
.entry_body,
#entry_detail
{
    width: auto !important;
    background: #ffffff !important;
    border: none !important;
    overflow: visible !important;
    float: none !important;
    margin: 0 2px 0 2px !important;
}

}
